org.openpnp.gui.support

Class SvgIcon

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openpnp.gui.support.SvgIcon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.swing.Icon

    public class SvgIcon
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.Icon
    A Swing Icon that draws an SVG image.
